section.title: Expected Scenarios Under Test:

listitem.para: Client gets notifications about the Line Crossing Counter EITHER subscribing to device messages using CreatePullPointSubscription operation OR subscribing to MQTT Broker server OR initiating of metadata streaming.

Client is considered as supporting Line Crossing Counter Event if the following conditions are met:
Client supports Media2_MetadataStreaming_ProfileM feature (please see section) OR EventHandling_Pullpoint feature (please see section) OR EventBrokerConfiguration feature (please see section) AND
Client is able to receive tns1:RuleEngine/CountAggregation/Counter notification.

Client is considered as NOT supporting Line Crossing Counter Event if the following conditions are met:
Client does not support Media2_MetadataStreaming_ProfileM feature (please see section) AND EventHandling_Pullpoint feature (please see section) AND EventBrokerConfiguration feature (please see section) OR
Client is NOT able to receive tns1:RuleEngine/CountAggregation/Counter notification.

section.para: NOTE: Test Operator shall mark corresponding checkbox on the Onvif Client Test Tool UI in case a client supports getting of this notification.
